text: (anhely) skazala, "O Dolya, my ye vashi kur'yery Lorda, ta tsi lyudy ne mozhutʹ torknutysya vas. Vy budete pereyikhaty z vashoyu rodynoyu protyahom nochi, ta budete dozvolyty ne budʹ khto vy dyvytesʹ nazad, krim vashoyi druzhyny; vona zasudzhuyetʹsya razom z tsymy khto zasudzhuyutʹsya. Yikhniy pryznachenyy chas yavlyaye soboyu ranok. Ne vystachte ranok skoro
